game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is currency, the last remnants of humanity live in sprawling metropolises known as Temporal Spires. Players take on the role of a Time Reaver, tasked with disrupting the delicate balance of time and uncovering the secrets behind the mysterious event known as The Great Deviation.
game.beginning: The game begins in the year 2256, where players find themselves in the midst of a bustling city-state called New Elysium. As a young Time Reaver, you've been recruited by an enigmatic organization known only as 'The Order' to investigate a series of temporal anomalies that threaten the stability of the timestream.
game.ending: As players delve deeper into the mysteries of The Great Deviation, they must navigate treacherous landscapes and battle powerful enemies to prevent a catastrophic future from unfolding. Ultimately, the fate of humanity hangs in the balance, and it's up to the player to decide what course of action to take: will you restore balance to the timestream, or allow the fabric of reality to unravel?
